title: Tofu Vegetable 🥦 Fried Rice 🌿
content:
Lunch Recipe: Tofu Vegetable Fried Rice  Servings: 4 Duration: 20 minutes Quick and tasty Tofu Vegetable Fried Rice 🍛 Easy to make in 15 minutes. It contains basil leaves, green onions, mixed freshly chopped vegetables and stir fried tofu then finally added cooked rice, spices, soya sauce and few add ons. I hope you could try this at home 🏡 and enjoy your weekend 😃🍿🌿 Happy weekend and Have a beautiful day 🍇😛 Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Cooked rice - 160 gms
  • Stir Fried tofu - 250 grams - cubed
  • Red bell pepper - 1/2 sliced
  • Yellow bell pepper - 1/2 sliced
  • Beans - 15 - 1 inch long cut
  • Carrot - Chopped - 1
  • Snow peas - 15 - chopped
  • Green onions - 3 - finely chopped
  • Broccoli - 6 florets
  • Cabbage - 1 cup - shredded
  • Schezwan sauce - 2 Tb sp
  • Soya sauce - 1 Tb sp
  • Vinegar - 1 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly sauce - 1 Tb sp
  • Red paprika - 1 tsp
  • Basil leaves - 5 - chopped
  • Sesame oil - 1 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • On a medium heated wok, add in sesame oil
  • Add carrot, bell peppers, beans and sauté 5 minutes
  • Next goes in broccoli, cabbage and snow peas
  • Saute more 5 minutes and add stir fried tofu. Combine well
  • Then add cooked rice along with salt, pepper, red Paprika, red chilly powder, schezwan sauce, red chilly sauce, vinegar, soya sauce. Mix everything well
  • Keep stirring or tossing wok over high heat for 5 minutes
  • Turn off heat and add basil leaves and green onions
  • Mix well and serve hot 😃👍
  • Tofu Vegetable Fried Rice is ready and enjoy your day 🙂
